alert.note: Alert for Delta (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 08 at 3:16PM EDT by NWS Marquette
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Delta County through 345 PM EDT... At 315 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near U.S. 41 between Trenary and Rapid River, or 19 miles north of Escanaba, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of north central Delta County, including the following locations... Maplewood. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
